Abstract:
Higher Education Department - Collegiate Education - Dr.Ajitha M.J., Assistant
Professor in Chemistry , Govt.Polytechnic College, Nedumangad -Permission to work
as an External Research Consultant for KAUST ,Saudi Arabia - Sanction accorded -

Orders Issued
Order Issued By:
(By order of the Governor)
JOINT SECRETARY
Body Para:
As per the recommendation of Director of Collegiate Education in the letter read
above, sanction is here by accorded to Dr.Ajitha M.J., Assistant Professor in Chemistry,
Govt.Polytechnic College, Nedumangad to work as an External Research Consultant for
a period of maximum 20 hours per week for 6 months in King Abdullah University of
Science and Technology(KAUST), Saudi Arabia without detrimental to her official
duties and without receiving any remuneration, subject to the provisions of Rule 48 of
the Kerala Government Servant's Conduct Rules,1960.
References:
Read: Letter No.Al/16490/2020/DCE dated 09.06.2020 & 09.10.2020 of
Director of Collegiate Education, Thiruvananthapuram,
